definition: in three month intervals, of or relating to or consisting of a quarter, a periodical that is published every quarter, or four issues per year
details:
adverb
- in three month intervals
= example: in three month intervals
= synonyms: every quarter
- in diagonally opposed quarters of an escutcheon
= example: in diagonally opposed quarters of an escutcheon
adjective
- of or relating to or consisting of a quarter
= example: of or relating to or consisting of a quarter
noun
- a periodical that is published every quarter, or four issues per year
= example: a periodical that is published every quarter, or four issues per year
